exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rminus_eq_0 (_ - _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rabs_R0 (Rabs 0) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment a : R x : Rbar eps : R -> Prop Heps : Rbar_locally a eps Unable to unify "Rbar_locally a eps" with "filtermap (fun _ : R => a) (Rbar_locally' x) eps".

original: unfold is_lim. intros eps Heps. exists 0%nat. intros x' Hx'. unfold R_dist. simpl. rewrite Rminus_eq_0. rewrite Rabs_R0. apply Heps.
